alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Montgomery; Robertson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 09 at 3:54PM CST until December 09 at 4:15PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY...NORTHERN CHEATHAM AND SOUTHWESTERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 354 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 9 miles northwest of Ashland City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Coopertown around 400 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Pleasant View. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 16 and 32. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
